title: Hearing things in fog of war
body: I was just wondering if anyone else can hear things within the fog of war like dragon attacking and dieing baron fights people useing their taunts ect all i have to do to hear these is just click on the mini map to a place like dragon and i can hear if the enemy is doing it or even when they finish it

replies.body:
I thought that was intentional, to reward the really observant players.

I for one know that you can see Shaco's particle effects even if he is stealthed by the fog of war.
Sounds like an interesting bug, there have been known cases of this such as Ammumu's taunt (See older patch notes for reference). Ill add it to my bug list and pass it on to a Rioter.
